pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau and his Special Envoy, Bob Rae, meet with Her Excellency Daw Aung San Suu Kyi, State Counsellor of Myanmar | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
The Prime Minister and his Special Envoy to Myanmar, the Honourable Bob Rae, met together with Her Excellency Daw Aung San Suu Kyi, State Counsellor of Myanmar.

They discussed Mr. Rae’s recent travel to the region. Given Canada’s commitment to the promotion of pluralism and humanitarianism, Prime Minister Trudeau conveyed Canada’s ongoing deep concern for the situation facing Rohingya refugees. He also conveyed Canada's interest in ongoing engagement with respect to this situation, including through support for implementing the recommendations of the Advisory Commission on Rakhine State.
